short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows access to the mobile version of Instagram on your desktop!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THIS PRODUCT IS NOT AFFILIATED WITH INSTAGRAM IN ANY WAY.

Flaxen allows access to the mobile version of Instagram from your desktop!
Ever wanted to send direct messages on Instagram from your laptop/desktop computer? This extension allows you to do just that! With a simple interface that allows switching between mobile and desktop views, this extension makes it much faster and easier to respond to your Instagram DMs.

If you want to use a desktop version of this (with dark mode!), check out Cervine (https://github.com/DevinMui/cervine) built by Devin Mui!
